attributes.title: gave me an std
attributes.review: bro i saw this app and then my mom came in and yelled that I didn’t thaw the meat, i went out cooked the rice and came back forgetting about the said app, later i started getting itchy, not feeling good at all, thought it was the fries i froze for my dad, looked down and there it WAS!! tiny orange midgets!! looked even closer and it was TRUMP!! HE WAS STRIKING FOR YOUNG GIRLS AGAIN!! i sprayed them with bug spray and they all fell and died, so in the some this app is a amazing🧚🏼‍♀️✨ ly racist.💖

attributes.title: download if you’re suicidal, it’ll get the job done.

this app is so full of hate and malice and only negative things that it PLUMMETED ME INTO DEPRESSION. this app is DANGEROUS IF YOU HAVE DEPRESSION. this app is DANGEROUS IF YOURE HAPPY. this app will truly make the world and the future look so unbelievably bleak, sad, and hopeless that it will make you want to be dead. better yet, it will crush your soul into oblivion and YOU WILL DIE IF YOU DOWNLOAD THIS APP OR VOTE FOR TRUMP IN 2020 (out of depression, bc your heart can’t take this type of abuse). 

#VOTEHIMOUT

attributes.title: TERRIBLE APP
attributes.review: This app is the WORST app i have EVER downloaded in my LIFE. As soon as i downloaded this app, it stole my car keys and ripped my hair out!!😡 Only two minutes later, the app punched my mom, AND stole HER car keys! I immediately deleted it, because i was furious! But that didn’t stop this terrible app. The app reinstalled on my phone without my permission, and it stole my oven👎. I would NOT recommend, getting this app. Please stay safe 🙏

attributes.title: TERRIBLE CUSTOMER SERVICE😡
attributes.review: this app is just so disrespectful and the service is just absolutely dIsGuStAnG! i wanted to buy a dinasoar for my 100 year old baby and they said no???? i was gonna pay and everything and it was just so disrespectful that they did it i HATE this app and everything about and take this app down immediately before i call authorities. and you don’t want me to do that... do you?

attributes.title: DISGUSTING ABSOLUTELY TERRIBLE APP
attributes.review: This app is awful!!!! I’ve never been more flustered with an app in my life!! At first it was great and then suddenly it started glitching all the time!!! When it would glitch it would all of sudden glitch to some Anime porn site which was weird and disgusting especially since I have kids that go on my phone sometimes!!!!! Ridiculous app from our President!! Don’t ever get this app!!!!!

attributes.title: Horrible disgusting
attributes.review: This app is horrible, not to mention that they kicked me child but the app lags. This thing is so useless my grandmother would use it to feed the pigs. The app doesn’t help at all and over all it’s not good. After I downloaded the app my phone started to glitch and it was so hot my hands almost got burned!!!!!! This app is horrible. Please do me a favor and never make it again.

attributes.title: WORST APP EVER!
attributes.review: It sent Secret service to my house and ripped up all my things because I said out loud that trump looked like a Cheeto puff! They were screaming while a bunch of Karen’s were cheering them on like cheerleaders in the background! 100% DO NOT recommend. They also found Ben and Jerry’s Ice cream in the freezer and threw it away but threw all of my other food away too because “all food matters” and then ripped the joe Biden sign out of my neighbors yard.
